data.text:
Hey guys, I have a pretty bad experience playing DHBM games. Why I watching ad after raid the port, the game was error,glitch, and crash.

I don’t know this is bug or glitch, looking the screenshot(sorry I censored the game name in ad).

After I exit the ad.

Look.

100% not engineering.

I have the same issue.

I don’t have this issue… I use this method frequently to get diamonds without watching ads. After the ad starts, I go to the home screen without closing the game, then I open the game again, the ad doesn’t appear again and I get the rewards, without technically watching the ad. PerBlue please don’t fix this

So you openly admit to exploiting a part of the game and then beg PerBlue not to fix it. Why say it at all?

Well, I don’t skip the adds myself. It just crashes after I try to close it.
